trans-unit.source: Extends the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> interface by providing advanced sorting and filtering capabilities.
With the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface, you implement advanced sorting as a set of property descriptor-direction pairs.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>您介面，實作進階排序為一組屬性描述元方向組。

trans-unit.source: You implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作篩選為字串解譯的資料來源實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" /> containing the sorts to apply to the data source.
Sorts the data source based on the given <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" />.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection, once constructed.
Gets or sets the filter to be used to exclude items from the collection of items returned by the data source
The string used to filter items out in the item collection returned by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 用來篩選項目中的資料來源所傳回的項目集合的字串。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.Filter%2A> property should exhibit the following behavior when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.Filter%2A> property is set: The data source returns only the items that meet the filter criteria when the list is accessed by item index or when the list is enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.Filter%2A>屬性應該會出現下列行為時<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.Filter%2A>屬性設定： 資料來源會傳回符合篩選準則時依項目索引，或當此清單時，存取清單的項目列舉。

trans-unit.source: The definition of the filter string is dependent on the data-source implementation, but the behavior associated with setting the filter should be modeled on <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 篩選字串的定義是取決於資料來源實作中，但與設定的篩選器相關聯的行為應該根據<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current filter applied to the data source.
With the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> type, you implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>您類型，實作篩選為字串解譯的資料來源實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of sort descriptions currently applied to the data source.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" /> currently applied to the data source.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection, once constructed.
Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports advanced sorting.
<see langword="true" /> if the data source supports advanced sorting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果資料來源支援進階排序，否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Advanced sorting refers to the ability to sort by multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 進階排序是指能夠依多個資料行排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports filtering.
<see langword="true" /> if the data source supports filtering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果資料來源支援篩選。，否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SupportsFiltering%2A> property, you implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SupportsFiltering%2A>您屬性，實作篩選為字串解譯的資料來源實作。
